attributes.action: arrange a form of National Mortgage Protection Insurance so that no family will ever be thrown out onto the streets for mortgage arrears -except in exceptional circumstances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Take out a credit card and the banks offer you a payment protection insurance. Take out a mortgage and you are entirely at their mercy if you get ill or lose your job through no fault of your own.
It costs the nation a fortune in benefits to look after those dispossessed -to say nothing of their heartache and trauma.
Why not a form of National Mortgage Protection Insurance? A Trust could be formed which would pay the mortgage payments in most cases (except wilful neglect)and would take a proportion of the equity in exchange -recovering their outlay when the house is eventually sold.The cost could be shared between the mortgage lenders and all mortgage payers.
I can NOT believe it is beyond the wit of man to create this necessary helping hand.
